ing: 2 navel oranges, peeled and cut into chunks
1 large red bell pepper, cut into bite-size pieces
n: Refreshing Sweet and Spicy Jicama Salad (Vegan)
des: "I made this as a side dish with some grilled basil chicken and spicy Italian chicken sausages; it was perfect! If you don't like spicy food, just cut back on the Thai chiles. My boyfriend and I loved it!"
ins:
Combine jicama, orange chunks, red bell pepper, cucumber, sweet yellow and orange peppers, radishes, Thai chile peppers, jalapeno pepper, cilantro, lemon juice, and black pepper in a large bowl.
Cover the bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate until flavors blend, about 30 minutes.
